mathale disthrikkayata ayath gammana kihipayak me wanawita gilabasime awadanamakata lakwi thibenawa.me wanawita mathale dunkola waththa dorakumbaura pradeshaye adi 60k usa kos gasak ha kithul gasak polowa yatata gila basa nopeni gos thibena athara ema nisa adi 20ka ha 30ka wishkambhayak sahitha walawal dekak sadi thibe.ema widiyowak ha jayarupa kihipayak pahathin.eeta yabada pradeshayaka silindar yodaganimin sada thibu adi 80k pamana gambaura lindak da gila basa thibe.

janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha giya sathianthaye indiyawe nawadilli nuwara, bala pitathwa giye nawadilliye pawathi jathyanthara surya balashakthi samuluwata sahabhagiwima wenuwen nawa dilli nuwara rashtrapathi bhawanhi pawathi mema samuluwe aarambhaka awasthawata janapathi maithri indiya agamathi narendra modi, pransha janadhipathi emmanuwel makron athulu ratawal rasaka nayakayo sahabhagi wuha.
